name: bulk_retweet
description: Retweet multiple tweets in parallel by their URLs. Skips already-retweeted tweets.

detailSteps.code: const rtBtn = document.querySelector('[data-testid$="retweet"]'); const unrtBtn = document.querySelector('[data-testid$="unretweet"]'); if (unrtBtn) return { status: 'already_retweeted', url: window.location.href }; if (rtBtn) { rtBtn.click(); return { status: 'clicked_retweet', url: window.location.href }; } return { status: 'not_found', url: window.location.href }
detailSteps.name: rt_click
detailSteps.label: Click retweet button

detailSteps.code: const confirm = document.querySelector('[data-testid="retweetConfirm"], [data-testid="repostConfirm"]'); if (confirm) { confirm.click(); return { status: 'retweeted', url: window.location.href }; } return { status: 'confirm_not_found', url: window.location.href }
detailSteps.name: rt_confirm
detailSteps.label: Confirm retweet
